createAccessCode.title: Access code banao
createAccessCode.introduction: Aapko jab bhi kisi ko Bloom ki access deni ho toh aap yeh form istemal karke access code bana sakte hain.
createAccessCode.liveChatAccess: Courses aur messaging ko access karo
createAccessCode.therapyAccess: Courses, messaging aur che therapy sessions ki access
createAccessCode.resultLink: Kripya user ko boliye idhar jaane ko <welcomeURL></welcomeURL>.
createAccessCode.resultCode: Vo apna email aur access code ko istemaal karke register kar sakte hain. <partnerAccessCode></partnerAccessCode>

form.featuresLabel: Iss user ko diye gai support type chuniye
form.featureTherapyLabel: Courses, messaging aur che therapy sessions

errors.createPartnerAccessError: Access code banane mein error tha. Doboara prayas kariya ya Bloom ki team se sampark karein.
errors.featureRequired: Access code banane se pehle ek support type chuniye

accessGuard.title: Access chahiye
accessGuard.introduction: Aapka account mein partner pages ki access shamil nahi hai. Yadi aapko yeh sahi nahi lag raha hai, toh <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko message karein</contactLink>.
